verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden דַּמָּ֑שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold דַמֶּ֙שֶׂק֙ <S%H1834><s%> Behold Damascus מוּסָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> is taken away מֵעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> from [being] a city וְהָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> and will become מְעִ֥י <S%H4596><s%> heap מַפָּלָֽה׃ <S%H4654><s%> and it shall be a ruinous

עֲזֻב֖וֹת <S%H5800><s%> [are] forsaken עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> The cities עֲרֹעֵ֑ר <S%H6177><s%> of Aroer לַעֲדָרִ֣ים <S%H5739><s%> they shall be for flocks תִּֽהְיֶ֔ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become וְרָבְצ֖וּ <S%H7257><s%> which shall lie down וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> and none shall make [them] afraid

וְנִשְׁבַּ֤ת <S%H7673><s%> also shall cease מִבְצָר֙ <S%H4013><s%> The fortress מֵֽאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> from Ephraim וּמַמְלָכָ֥ה <S%H4467><s%> and the kingdom מִדַּמֶּ֖שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> from Damascus וּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> and the remnant אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria כִּכְב֤וֹד <S%H3519><s%> they shall be as the glory בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יִֽהְי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts ס

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִדַּ֖ל <S%H1809><s%> shall be made thin כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> it shall come to pass [that] the glory יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וּמִשְׁמַ֥ן <S%H4924><s%> and the fatness בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> of his flesh יֵרָזֶֽה׃ <S%H7329><s%> shall wax lean

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> like כֶּֽאֱסֹף֙ <S%H622><s%> gathereth קָצִ֣יר <S%H7105><s%> And it shall be as when the harvestman קָמָ֔ה <S%H7054><s%> the corn וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> with his arm שִׁבֳּלִ֣ים <S%H7641><s%> the ears יִקְצ֑וֹר <S%H7114><s%> and reapeth וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּמְלַקֵּ֥ט <S%H3950><s%> and it shall be as he that gathereth שִׁבֳּלִ֖ים <S%H7641><s%> ears בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> of Rephaim

וְנִשְׁאַר־ <S%H7604><s%> shall be left בּ֤וֹ עֽוֹלֵלֹת֙ <S%H5955><s%> Yet gleaning grapes כְּנֹ֣קֶף <S%H5363><s%> in it as the shaking זַ֔יִת <S%H2132><s%> of an olive tree שְׁנַ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> two שְׁלֹשָׁ֛ה <S%H7969><s%> [or] three גַּרְגְּרִ֖ים <S%H1620><s%> berries בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> in the top אָמִ֑יר <S%H534><s%> of the uppermost bough אַרְבָּעָ֣ה <S%H702><s%> four חֲמִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H2568><s%> [or] five בִּסְעִפֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5585><s%> branches פֹּֽרִיָּ֔ה <S%H6509><s%> in the outmost fruitful נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> thereof saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> At that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִשְׁעֶ֥ה <S%H8159><s%> look הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> shall a man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for עֹשֵׂ֑הוּ <S%H6213><s%> to his Maker וְעֵינָ֕יו <S%H5869><s%> and his eyes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> to the Holy יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> One of Israel תִּרְאֶֽינָה׃ <S%H7200><s%> shall have respect

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשְׁעֶ֔ה <S%H8159><s%> And he shall not look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for הַֽמִּזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> to the altars מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יָדָ֑יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> have made אֶצְבְּעֹתָיו֙ <S%H676><s%> [that] which his fingers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> neither shall respect וְהָאֲשֵׁרִ֖ים <S%H842><s%> either the groves וְהָחַמָּנִֽים׃ <S%H2553><s%> or the images

בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְי֣וּ ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities מָעֻזּ֗וֹ <S%H4581><s%> shall his strong כַּעֲזוּבַ֤ת <S%H5805><s%> forsaken הַחֹ֙רֶשׁ֙ <S%H2793><s%> bough וְהָ֣אָמִ֔יר <S%H534><s%> and an uppermost branch אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָזְב֔וּ <S%H5800><s%> be as a forsaken מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <S%H8077><s%> and there shall be desolation

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁכַ֙חַתְּ֙ <S%H7911><s%> Because thou hast forgotten אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׁעֵ֔ךְ <S%H3468><s%> of thy salvation וְצ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> of the rock מָעֻזֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4581><s%> of thy strength לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not זָכָ֑רְתְּ <S%H2142><s%> and hast not been mindful עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that תִּטְּעִי֙ <S%H5193><s%> therefore shalt thou plant נִטְעֵ֣י <S%H5194><s%> plants נַעֲמָנִ֔ים <S%H5282><s%> pleasant וּזְמֹ֥רַת <S%H2156><s%> slips זָ֖ר <S%H2114><s%> it with strange תִּזְרָעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2232><s%> and shalt set

בְּי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day נִטְעֵךְ֙ <S%H5194><s%> shalt thou make thy plant תְּשַׂגְשֵׂ֔גִי <S%H7735><s%> to grow וּבַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and in the morning זַרְעֵ֣ךְ <S%H2233><s%> shalt thou make thy seed תַּפְרִ֑יחִי <S%H6524><s%> to flourish נֵ֥ד <S%H5067><s%> [shall be] a heap קָצִ֛יר <S%H7105><s%> [but] the harvest בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> of grief וּכְאֵ֥ב <S%H3511><s%> sorrow אָנֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H605><s%> and of desperate ס

ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe הֲמוֹן֙ <S%H1995><s%> to the multitude עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> of many כַּהֲמ֥וֹת <S%H1993><s%> [which] make a noise יַמִּ֖ים <S%H3220><s%> of the seas יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <S%H1993><s%> like the noise וּשְׁא֣וֹן <S%H7588><s%> and to the rushing לְאֻמִּ֔ים <S%H3816><s%> of nations כִּשְׁא֛וֹן <S%H7588><s%> the rumbling מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters כַּבִּירִ֖ים <S%H3524><s%> of mighty יִשָּׁאֽוּן׃ <S%H7582><s%> [that] make a rushing like the rushing

לְאֻמִּ֗ים <S%H3816><s%> The nations כִּשְׁא֞וֹן <S%H7588><s%> like the rushing מַ֤יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> of many יִשָּׁא֔וּן <S%H7582><s%> shall rush וְגָ֥עַר <S%H1605><s%> but [God] shall rebuke בּ֖וֹ וְנָ֣ס <S%H5127><s%> them and they shall flee מִמֶּרְחָ֑ק <S%H4801><s%> far off וְרֻדַּ֗ף <S%H7291><s%> and shall be chased כְּמֹ֤ץ <S%H4671><s%> as the chaff הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind וּכְגַלְגַּ֖ל <S%H1534><s%> and like a rolling thing לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before סוּפָֽה׃ <S%H5492><s%> the whirlwind

לְעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> time עֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H6153><s%> evening וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בַלָּהָ֔ה <S%H1091><s%> trouble בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before בֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> [and] before the morning אֵינֶ֑נּוּ <S%H369><s%> are no זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> Such חֵ֣לֶק <S%H2506><s%> he [is] not This [is] the portion שׁוֹסֵ֔ינוּ <S%H8154><s%> of them that spoil וְגוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> us and the lot לְבֹזְזֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H962><s%> of them that rob ס
